title: Is Kamala Harris Not Eligible to Serve as U.S. President?
subtitle: The requirements for serving as U.S. President were established over 200 years ago and haven't changed much since.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Sen. Kamala Harris is not eligible to serve as U.S. President because neither of her parents was “a legal resident for 5 years prior to [her] birth” and she was “not raised in the United States.”
